Noctenium affects us allâ€”the trees, the order, the giant beasts.

Our researchers tell me the only way to ensure the safety of the order is to thin out the basilisks, fangspawns, and fimbrilisks here.

We're an alliance and we're in this together! If level 65 members help lower level alliance members in this task, they'll get this bonus reward!

, the order grows stronger, thanks to your help.
For the Iron Order!
